name: Mojito
prepareSteps: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add a splash of soda water and fill the glass with cracked ice. Pour the rum and top with soda water. Garnish and serve with straw.

name: Old Fashioned
prepareSteps:
Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolved.
Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey.

Garnish with orange twist, and a cocktail cherry.

name: Long Island Tea
prepareSteps: Combine all ingredients (except cola) and pour over ice in a highball glass. Add the splash of cola for color. Decorate with a slice of lemon and serve.

name: Negroni
prepareSteps: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

name: Whiskey Sour
prepareSteps: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass, garnish and serve. If served 'On the rocks', strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

name: Dry Martini
prepareSteps: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

name: Daiquiri
prepareSteps: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

name: Margarita
prepareSteps: Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it. Take care to moisten only the outer rim and sprinkle the salt on it. The salt should present to the lips of the imbiber and never mix into the cocktail. Shake the other ingredients with ice, then carefully pour into the glass.

name: Manhattan
prepareSteps: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.

name: Moscow Mule
prepareSteps: Combine vodka and ginger beer in a highball glass filled with ice. Add lime juice. Stir gently. Garnish.

name: After Dinner Cocktail
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients (except lime wedge) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the wedge of lime and serve.

name: After Supper Cocktail
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Alabama Slammer
prepareSteps: Pour all ingredients (except for lemon juice) over ice in a highball glass. Stir, add a dash of lemon juice, and serve.

name: Alaska Cocktail
prepareSteps: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass. Drop in a twist of lemon and serve.

name: Alexander
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Brandy Alexander
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Alfie Cocktail
prepareSteps: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Algonquin
prepareSteps: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Allegheny
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Allies Cocktail
prepareSteps: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Almeria
prepareSteps: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Almond Joy
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Amaretto And Cream
prepareSteps: Shake well with cracked ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Amaretto Mist
prepareSteps: Pour amaretto in an old-fashioned glass over crushed ice. Add the wedge of lime and serve. (A wedge of lemon may be substituted for lime, if preferred.)

name: Amaretto Rose
prepareSteps: Pour amaretto and lime juice over ice in a collins glass. Fill with club soda and serve.

name: Amaretto Stinger
prepareSteps: Shake ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Amaretto Tea
prepareSteps: Pour hot tea into a pousse-cafe glass, using a spoon in glass to prevent cracking. Add amaretto, but do not stir. Top with chilled whipped cream and serve.

name: Angel Face
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass.

name: Applecar
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Apricot Lady
prepareSteps: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, apricot brandy, triple sec, lemon juice, and egg white. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with the orange slice.

name: Archbishop
prepareSteps: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

name: Arise My Love
prepareSteps: Put creme de menthe into a champagne flute. Fill with chilled champagne and serve.

name: Arthur Tompkins
prepareSteps: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, Grand Marnier, and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Artillery
prepareSteps: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Balmoral
prepareSteps: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Banana Daiquiri
prepareSteps: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

name: Bermuda Highball
prepareSteps: Pour brandy, gin, and dry vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the twist of lemon and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

name: Black Russian
prepareSteps: Pour the ingredients into an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

name: Blackthorn
prepareSteps: Stir sloe gin and vermouth with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Bloody Maria
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients (except lemon slice) with cracked ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of lemon and serve.

name: Bloody Mary
prepareSteps: Stirring gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass. Garnish.

name: Blue Lagoon
prepareSteps: Pour vodka and curacao over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Blue Margarita
prepareSteps: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lime juice. Dip rim in coarse salt. Shake tequila, blue curacao, and lime juice with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

name: Blue Mountain
prepareSteps: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass alomst filled with ice cubes.

name: Bluebird
prepareSteps: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine the gin, triple sec, Curacao, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist and the cherry.

name: Bobby Burns Cocktail
prepareSteps: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Boomerang
prepareSteps: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, vermouth, bitters, and maraschino liqueur. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.

name: Boston Sidecar
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Boston Sour
prepareSteps: Shake juice of lemon, powdered sugar, blended whiskey, and egg white with cracked ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Classic Old-Fashioned
prepareSteps: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the bitters and water into the sugar cube, using the back of a teaspoon. Almost fill the glass with ice cubes and add the bourbon. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry. Serve with a swizzle stick.

name: Bourbon Sling
prepareSteps: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, water, lemon juice, and bourbon. Shake well. Strain well. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Bourbon Sour
prepareSteps: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the bourbon, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a whiskey sour glass, garnish with the orange slice and cherry.

name: Boxcar
prepareSteps: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

name: Brandy Cobbler
prepareSteps: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the brandy. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

name: Brandy Flip
prepareSteps: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, egg, sugar, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Brandy Sour
prepareSteps: Shake brandy, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the lemon slice, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Caipirinha
prepareSteps: Place lime and sugar into old fashioned glass and muddle (mash the two ingredients together using a muddler or a wooden spoon). Fill the glass with ice and add the Cachaça.

name: California Lemonade
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over shaved ice. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with slices of orange and lemon. Add the cherry and serve with a straw.

name: Casa Blanca
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Casino Royale
prepareSteps: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

name: Champagne Cocktail
prepareSteps: Add dash of Angostura bitter onto sugar cube and drop it into champagne flute. Add cognac followed by gently pouring chilled champagne. Garnish with orange slice and maraschino cherry.

name: Cherry Rum
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Chicago Fizz
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Chocolate Black Russian
prepareSteps: Combine all ingredients in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a chilled champagne flute and serve.

name: City Slicker
prepareSteps: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Clove Cocktail
prepareSteps: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Cuba Libre
prepareSteps: Build all ingredients in a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Dragonfly
prepareSteps: In a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and ginger ale. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Dry Rob Roy
prepareSteps: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Dubonnet Cocktail
prepareSteps: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: English Highball
prepareSteps: Pour brandy, gin, and sweet vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Add the twist of lemon peel, stir, and serve. (Ginger ale may be substituted for carbonated water, if preferred.)

name: English Rose Cocktail
prepareSteps: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip rim of glass in powdered sugar. Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into sugar-rimmed glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Flying Dutchman
prepareSteps: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and triple sec. Stir well.

name: Flying Scotchman
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Foxy Lady
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: French "75"
prepareSteps: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, sugar, and lemon juice. Shake well. Pour into a collins glass. Top with the Champagne. Stir well and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

name: Frisco Sour
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients (except slices of lemon and lime) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the slices of lemon and lime and serve.

name: Frozen Daiquiri
prepareSteps: Combine all ingredients (except for the cherry) in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for five seconds, then blend at a high speed until firm. Pour contents into a champagne flute, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Frozen Mint Daiquiri
prepareSteps: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Frozen Pineapple Daiquiri
prepareSteps: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

name: Gentleman's Club
prepareSteps: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

name: Gin And Tonic
prepareSteps: Pour the gin and the tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Gin Cooler
prepareSteps: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice and add gin. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end of the orange spiral dangles over rim of glass.

name: Gin Daisy
prepareSteps: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the wine, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

name: Gin Fizz
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into glass. Top with soda water.

name: Gin Sling
prepareSteps: Dissolve powdered sugar in mixture of water and juice of lemon. Add gin. Pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and stir. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Gin Smash
prepareSteps: Muddle sugar with carbonated water and mint sprigs in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and 1 ice cube. Stir, add the orange slice and the cherry, and serve.

name: Gin Sour
prepareSteps: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

name: Gin Squirt
prepareSteps: Stir gin, grenadine, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with the pineapple chunks and the strawberries and serve.

name: Gin Swizzle
prepareSteps: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the lime juice, sugar, gin, and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a colling glass with ice cubes. Stir until the glass is frosted. Strain the mixture in the shaker into the glass and add the club soda.

name: Gin Toddy
prepareSteps: Mix powdered sugar and water in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and one ice cube. Stir, add the twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Godchild
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.

name: Godfather
prepareSteps: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

name: Godmother
prepareSteps: Pour vodka and amaretto into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve.

name: Grass Skirt
prepareSteps: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, triple sec, pineapple juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the pineapple slice.

name: Harvey Wallbanger
prepareSteps: Stir the vodka and orange juice with ice in the glass, then float the Galliano on top. Garnish and serve.

name: Havana Cocktail
prepareSteps: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Hawaiian Cocktail
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Highland Fling Cocktail
prepareSteps: Stir all ingredients (except olive) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the olive and serve.

name: Imperial Fizz
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Irish Spring
prepareSteps: Pour all ingredients (except orange slice and cherry) into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with the slice of orange, add the cherry on top, and serve.

name: Jack Rose Cocktail
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Japanese Fizz
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Jewel Of The Nile
prepareSteps: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: John Collins
prepareSteps: Pour all ingredients directly into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish. Add a dash of Angostura bitters.

name: Kamikaze
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients together with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.

name: Kentucky B And B
prepareSteps: Pour the bourbon and Benedictine into a brandy snifter.

name: Kentucky Colonel
prepareSteps: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the courbon and Benedictine. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Lady Love Fizz
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Loch Lomond
prepareSteps: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, Drambuie, and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: London Town
prepareSteps: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Lone Tree Cocktail
prepareSteps: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Lone Tree Cooler
prepareSteps: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice, add gin and vermouth, and stir. Fill with carbonated water and stir again. Add the twist of lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end dangles over rim of glass.

name: Lord And Lady
prepareSteps: Pour the rum and Tia Maria into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Mai Tai
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish and serve with straw.

name: Martinez Cocktail
prepareSteps: Stir all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

name: Martini
prepareSteps: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

name: Midnight Cowboy
prepareSteps: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mississippi Planters Punch
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Monkey Wrench
prepareSteps: Pour all of the ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: New York Sour
prepareSteps: Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Float claret on top. Decorate with the half-slice of lemon and the cherry and serve.

name: Orange Oasis
prepareSteps: Shake brandy, gin, and orange juice with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: Orgasm
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Pink Gin
prepareSteps: Pour the bitters into a wine glass. Swirl the glass to coat the inside with the bitters, shake out the excess. Pour the gin into the glass. Do not add ice.

name: Pink Lady
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Poppy Cocktail
prepareSteps: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Port And Starboard
prepareSteps: Pour carefully into a pousse-cafe glass, so that creme de menthe floats on grenadine. Serve without mixing.

name: Port Wine Cocktail
prepareSteps: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Port Wine Flip
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Quaker's Cocktail
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Quarter Deck Cocktail
prepareSteps: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Queen Bee
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Queen Charlotte
prepareSteps: Pour red wine and grenadine into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with lemon-lime soda, stir, and serve.

name: Queen Elizabeth
prepareSteps: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Quentin
prepareSteps: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, Kahlua, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

name: Royal Fizz
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients (except cola) with ice and strain into a chilled collins glass. Fill with cola and serve.

name: Royal Gin Fizz
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

name: Rum Cobbler
prepareSteps: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the rum. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

name: Rum Cooler
prepareSteps: Pour the rum and soda into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon wedge.

name: Rum Milk Punch
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Rum Old-fashioned
prepareSteps: Stir powdered sugar, water, and bitters in an old-fashioned glass. When sugar has dissolved add ice cubes and light rum. Add the twist of lime peel, float 151 proof rum on top, and serve.

name: Rum Screwdriver
prepareSteps: Pour rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add orange juice, stir, and serve.

name: Rum Sour
prepareSteps: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

name: Rum Toddy
prepareSteps: Dissolve powdered sugar in water in an old-fashioned glass. Add rum and one ice cube and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

name: Rusty Nail
prepareSteps: Pour the Scotch and Drambuie into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Salty Dog
prepareSteps: Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir well and serve. (Vodka may be substituted for gin, if preferred.)

name: Sazerac
prepareSteps: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice, and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Add the lemon peel for garnish.

name: Scooter
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Scotch Cobbler
prepareSteps: Pour scotch, brandy, and curacao over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add the orange slice, top with the mint sprig, and serve.

name: Scotch Sour
prepareSteps: Shake scotch, juice of lime, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with 1/2 slice lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Screwdriver
prepareSteps: Mix in a highball glass with ice. Garnish and serve.

name: Shanghai Cocktail
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Sherry Eggnog
prepareSteps: Shake sherry, powdered sugar, and egg with ice and strain into a collins glass. Fill with milk and stir. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Sherry Flip
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

name: Sidecar
prepareSteps: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Sidecar Cocktail
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Singapore Sling
prepareSteps: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into highball glass. Garnish with pineapple and cocktail cherry.

name: Sloe Gin Cocktail
prepareSteps: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Sol Y Sombra
prepareSteps: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a brandy snifter, and serve. (The English translation of the name of this drink is "Sun and Shade", and after sampling this drink, you'll understand why. Thanks, Kirby.)

name: Stone Sour
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled whiskey sour glass, and serve.

name: Strawberry Daiquiri
prepareSteps: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

name: Strawberry Margarita
prepareSteps: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip rim in salt. Shake schnapps, tequila, triple sec, lemon juice, and strawberries with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

name: Tequila Fizz
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients (except ginger ale) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

name: Tequila Sour
prepareSteps: Shake tequila, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the half-slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

name: Thriller
prepareSteps: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Tom Collins
prepareSteps: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass alomst filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

name: Turf Cocktail
prepareSteps: Stir all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

name: Tuxedo Cocktail
prepareSteps: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and a twist of lemon zest.

name: Valencia Cocktail
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Van Vleet
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Vermouth Cassis
prepareSteps: Stir vermouth and creme de cassis in a highball glass with ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir again, and serve.

name: Vesuvio
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

name: Veteran
prepareSteps: Pour the rum and cherry brandy into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

name: Victor
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Victory Collins
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients (except orange slice) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Add the slice of orange and serve.

name: Vodka And Tonic
prepareSteps: Pour vodka into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with tonic water, stir, and serve.

name: Waikiki Beachcomber
prepareSteps: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Whisky Mac
prepareSteps: Pour both of the ingredients into a wine goblet with no ice.

name: White Russian
prepareSteps: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with light cream and serve.

name: Afterglow
prepareSteps: Mix. Serve over ice.

name: Alice Cocktail
prepareSteps: Shake well, strain into a large cocktail glass.

name: Apple Karate
prepareSteps: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

name: Bora Bora
prepareSteps: Prepare in a blender or shaker, serve in a highball glass on the rocks. Garnish with 1 slice of pineapple and one cherry.

name: Orangeade
prepareSteps: Place some ice cubes in a large tumbler or highball glass, add lemon juice, orange juice, sugar syrup, and stir well. Top up with cold soda water, serve with a drinking straw.

name: Rail Splitter
prepareSteps: Mix sugar syrup with lemon juice in a tall glass. Fill up with ginger ale.

name: Banana Milk Shake
prepareSteps: Blend very well, preferably in a household mixer. Serve in a wine glass, garnish with whipped cream and a piece of banana.

name: Banana Strawberry Shake
prepareSteps: Blend all together in a blender until smooth.

name: Banana Strawberry Shake Daiquiri-type
prepareSteps: Blend all together in a blender until smooth.

name: Egg Cream
prepareSteps: Mix syrup and milk in a fountain glass. Add soda water, serve with a straw.

name: Fruit Cooler
prepareSteps: Toss strawberries with sugar, and let sit overnight in refrigerator. Cut lemon, reserve two slices. Juice the rest. Mix together the lemon juice, strawberries, apple juice, and soda water. Add slices of lemon (decor, really). In glasses, put ice cubes, and a slice of apple. Pour drink in, and serve.

name: Fruit Flip-Flop
prepareSteps: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

name: Fruit Shake
prepareSteps: Blend til smooth.

name: Just a Moonmint
prepareSteps: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

name: Lassi - A South Indian Drink
prepareSteps: Blend in a blender for 3 seconds. Lassi is one of the easiest things to make, and there are many ways of making it. Basically, it is buttermilk (yoghurt whisked with water), and you can choose almost any consistency that you like, from the thinnest to the thickest. Serve cold.

name: Lassi Khara
prepareSteps: Blend (frappe) in blender until frothy. Add torn curry leaves and serve cold.

name: Lassi Raita
prepareSteps: Blend the yoghurt and ice cubes together, until the yoghurt becomes more liquid. Add sugar to taste. The lemon/lime is optional but it gives it a slightly tart taste. Dash of salt. Raita is also good for the summer. Instead of having a traditional salad you can make raita instead.

name: Lassi - Sweet
prepareSteps: Put all ingredients into a blender and blend until nice and frothy. Serve chilled.

name: Lassi - Mango
prepareSteps: Put it all in a blender and pour over crushed ice. You can also use other fruits like strawberries and bananas.

name: Lemouroudji
prepareSteps: Juice the lemons. Peel and grate the ginger. Place the grated ginger and a liberal dash of the cayenne pepper into a piece of cheesecloth, and tie it into a knot. Let soak in the water. After 15 minutes or so, add the sugar, and the lemon juice. Chill, and serve.

name: Limeade
prepareSteps: In a large glass, put the lime juice and sugar, and stir well. Add cold seltzer water to fill. Put the lime peels in the glass. Drink. Repeat until limes or soda run out.

name: Imperial Cocktail
prepareSteps: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Banana Cantaloupe Smoothie
prepareSteps: Juice cantaloupe, pour juice into blender, add banana, and liquify.

name: Apple Berry Smoothie
prepareSteps: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

name: Grape lemon pineapple Smoothie
prepareSteps: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

name: Kiwi Papaya Smoothie
prepareSteps: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

name: Mango Orange Smoothie
prepareSteps: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

name: Pineapple Gingerale Smoothie
prepareSteps: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

name: Kill the cold Smoothie
prepareSteps: Juice ginger and lemon and add it to hot water. You may add cardomom.

name: Strawberry Shivers
prepareSteps: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

name: Sweet Bananas
prepareSteps: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

name: Tomato Tang
prepareSteps: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

name: Yoghurt Cooler
prepareSteps: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up. Note: Use lots of ice in this one - great on hot days! To add ice: Remove the center of the cover while the blender is on - drop 3 or 4 ice cubs and blend until they're completely crushed.

name: Castillian Hot Chocolate
prepareSteps: Shift the cocoa and sugar together into a medium-sized saucepan. Dissolve the cornstarch in the water, and stir into the cocoa and sugar until it is a smooth paste. Begin heating the mixture, stirring it with a whisk, and gradually pour in the milk. Continue stirring with the whisk as you bring the liquid to a simmer. Allow the chocolate to simmer for about 10 minutes, stirring often, until it is thick, glossy and completely smooth. Serve steaming hot in coffee mug. Serves six.

name: Chocolate Beverage
prepareSteps: Boil milk in the top of a deep double boiler five minutes. Remove from fire and add chocolate, mixed with the cinnamon, a little at a time, beating with molinillo or egg beater after each addition. When the chocolate is thoroughly blended, heat to the boiling point. Place over bottom of double boiler and add eggs, whipping constantly, until they are thoroughly blended and the mixture is frothing. Serve in coffee mug. Serves eight.

name: Chocolate Drink
prepareSteps: Melt the bar in a small amount of boiling water. Add milk. Cook over low heat, whipping gently (with a whisk, i would assume) until heated well. Don't let it boil! Serve in coffee mug.

name: Drinking Chocolate
prepareSteps: Heat the cream and milk with the cinnamon and vanilla bean very slowly for 15-20 minutes. (If you don't have any beans add 1-2 tsp of vanilla after heating). Remove the bean and cinnamon. Add the chocolate. Mix until fully melted. Serve topped with some very dense fresh whipped cream. Serves 1-2 depending upon how much of a glutton you are. For a richer chocolate, use 4 oz of milk, 4 oz of cream, 4 oz of chocolate. Serve in coffee mug.

name: Hot Chocolate to Die for
prepareSteps: Melt the chocolate, butter and vanilla in a double boiler. When just smooth stir in the cream.

name: Microwave Hot Cocoa
prepareSteps: Combine sugar, cocoa, salt and hot water in 1-quart micro-proof measuring cup (or coffee mug). Microwave at HIGH (100%) for 1 to 1 1/2 minutes or until boiling. Add milk, sitr and microwave an additonal 1 1/2 to 2 minutes or until hot. Stir in vanilla, blend well.

name: Nuked Hot Chocolate
prepareSteps: Mix with a bit of milk (1 oz or so) in coffee mug. Nuke mug for about 30-50 seconds. Stir until the heated cocoa dissolves. Fill mug with milk. Nuke for 1-2 minutes, depending on wattage and preferences as to burnt mouth parts.

name: Orange Scented Hot Chocolate
ingredients: Chocolate|4 oz chopped bittersweet or semi-sweet
prepareSteps: Combine all ingredients in heavy medium saucepan. Stir over low heat until chocolate melts. Increase heat and bring just to a boil, stirring often. Remove from heat and whisk untily frothy. Return to heat and bring to boil again. Remove from heat, whisk until frothy. Repeat heating and whisking once again. Discard orange peel. (Can be prepared 2 hours ahead. Let stand at room temperature. Before serving, bring just to boil, remove from heat and whisk until frothy.) Pour hot chocolate into coffee mugs. Makes 2 servings.

name: Spanish chocolate
prepareSteps: Stir the milk with the chocolate and the cinnamon over low heat until the chocolate dissolves. Add the eggs and beat the mixture until it becomes thick, taking care not to boil. Serve in coffee mug.

name: Lemon Shot
prepareSteps: Mix Galliano and Absolut Citron in a shot glass, lay lemon wedge sprinkled with sugar over glass and pour a rum over wedge and glass. light rum with a lighter and let burn for a second. Do shot quickly and suck on lemon. If it is done correctly, this will taste like a shot of sweet lemonade.

name: Sex on the Beach
prepareSteps: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Autodafé
prepareSteps: Mix and fill up with soda water. Drunk by finns on a sunny day any time of the year and day.

name: Gagliardo
prepareSteps: Shake well and serve in a cocktail glass. This is a home cocktail of American/Internet Bar del Pozzo, Pavia, Italy.

name: Surf City Lifesaver
prepareSteps: Lots of ice and soda top up in tall glass with cherry and a grin.

name: Grizzly Bear
prepareSteps: Served over ice. Sounds nasty, but tastes great.

name: Karsk
prepareSteps: Put a copper coin in a coffe-cup and fill up with coffee until you no longer see the coin, then add alcohol until you see the coin. Norwegian speciality.

name: Happy Skipper
prepareSteps: Pour Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum over ice, fill glass to top with Ginger Ale. Garnish with lime. Tastes like a cream soda. Named for the Gilligan's Island reference ("The Captain" *in* "Ginger" is a Happy Skipper!)

name: Frappé
prepareSteps: Mix together. Blend at highest blender speed for about 1 minute. Pour into a glass and drink with a straw. Notes: This works best if everything is cold (if you make fresh coffee, mix it with the milk and let it sit in the fridge for 1/2 hour. If it is not frothy, add more milk, or even just some more milk powder. The froth gradually turns to liquid at the bottom of the glass, so you will find that you can sit and drink this for about 1/2 hour, with more iced coffee continually appearing at the bottom. Very refreshing.

name: Iced Coffee
prepareSteps: Mix together until coffee and sugar is dissolved. Add milk. Shake well. Using a blender or milk shake maker produces a very foamy drink. Serve in coffee mug.

name: Iced Coffee Fillip
prepareSteps: Mix together in a coffee mug and chill before serving.

name: Masala Chai
prepareSteps: Bring 2 cups of water to boil. Add all the ingredients and boil again for about 15 seconds. Let stand for a minute. Warm milk in a pot. Filter tea into cups. Add milk and sugar. That's IT.

name: Melya
prepareSteps: Brew espresso. In a coffee mug, place 1 teaspoon of unsweetened powdered cocoa, then cover a teaspoon with honey and drizzle it into the cup. Stir while the coffee brews, this is the fun part. The cocoa seems to coat the honey without mixing, so you get a dusty, sticky mass that looks as though it will never mix. Then all at once, presto! It looks like dark chocolate sauce. Pour hot espresso over the honey, stirring to dissolve. Serve with cream.

name: Spiking coffee
prepareSteps: Incidentally, a pinch of cinnamon is indeed a nice addition to coffee but true heaven is a cardamom seed. Of course, you serve it in a coffee mug.

name: Thai Coffee
prepareSteps: Place the coffee and spices in the filter cone of your coffee maker. Brew coffee as usual, let it cool. In a tall glass, dissolve 1 or 2 teaspoons of sugar in an ounce of the coffee (it's easier to dissolve than if you put it right over ice). Add 5-6 ice cubes and pour coffee to within about 1 inch of the top of the glass. Rest a spoon on top of the coffee and slowly pour whipping cream into the spoon. This will make the cream float on top of the coffee rather than dispersing into it right away.

name: Thai Iced Coffee
prepareSteps: Prepare a pot of coffee at a good European strength. In the ground coffee, add 2 or 3 freshly ground cardamom pods. Sweeten while hot, then cool quickly. Serve in highball glass over ice, with cream. To get the layered effect, place a spoon atop the coffee and pour the milk carefully into the spoon so that it floats on the top of the coffee.

name: Thai Iced Tea
prepareSteps: Combine Thai tea (i.e., the powder), boiling water, and sweetened condensed milk, stir until blended. Pour into 2 tall glasses filled with ice cubes. Garnish with mint leaves. Makes 2 servings.

name: Absinthe #2
prepareSteps: Mix together and let sit a few days. Strain through a coffee filter. To serve mix 1 part absinthe to 4 parts water, add ice, enjoy.

name: Amaretto Liqueur
prepareSteps: Combine sugar and 3/4 cup water in a small saucepan. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat and simmer until all sugar is dissolved. Remove from heat and cool. In an aging container, combine apricot halves, almond extract, grain alcohol with 1/2 cup water, and brandy. Stir in cooled sugar syrup mixture. Cap and let age for 2 days. Remove apricot halves. (Save apricot halves, can be used for cooking). Add food coloring and glycerine. Stir, recap and continue aging for 1 to 2 months. Re-bottle as desired. Liqueur is ready to serve but will continue to improve with additional aging.

name: Angelica Liqueur
prepareSteps: Combine all herbs, nuts and spices with vodka in a 1 quart or larger aging container. Cap tightly and shake daily for 2 weeks. Strain through a fine muslin cloth or coffee filter, discarding solids. Clean out aging container. Place liquid back in container. Place sugar and water in saucepan and stir to combine over medium heat. When sugar is completely dissolved, set aside and let cool. When cool combine with food coloring and add to liqueur liquid. Cap and allow to age and mellow in a cool, dark place for one month.

name: Caribbean Orange Liqueur
prepareSteps: Pare very thinly the bright-colored rind from the oranges (no white). Blot the peel on paper towels to remove any excess oil. Put peel in a 4 cup screw-top jar. Add 2 cups vodka. Close jar. Store in a cool, dark place for 2 days or until the vodka has absorbed the flavor. Remove peel and add remaining vodka. Close jar and add remaining cup of vodka. Close the jar and store in a cool dark place at least 1 month to age.

name: Coffee Liqueur
prepareSteps: Combine coffee, sugar and water. Simmer 1 hour and let cool. Add vanilla and vodka. Age in sealed jar 2 to 3 weeks.

name: Coffee-Vodka
prepareSteps: Boil water and sugar until dissolved. Turn off heat. Slowly add dry instant coffee and continue stirring. Add a chopped vanilla bean to the vodka, then combine the cooled sugar syrup and coffee solution with the vodka. Cover tightly and shake vigorously each day for 3 weeks. Strain and filter. Its also best to let the sugar mixture cool completely so the vodka won't evaporate when its added. If you like a smoother feel to the liqueur you can add about 1 teaspoon of glycerine to the finished product.

name: Cranberry Cordial
prepareSteps: Place the chopped cranberries in a 2 liter jar that has a tight-fitting lid. Add the sugar and rum. Adjust the lid securely and place the jar in a cool, dark place. Invert the jar and shake it every day for six weeks. Strain the cordial into bottles and seal with corks.

name: Creme de Menthe
prepareSteps: Bring sugar and water to a boil and simmer for 10 minutes. Cool. Add the remaining ingredients and stir. Cover and let ripen for 1 month.

name: Irish Cream
prepareSteps: Mix scotch and milk. Add half-and-half. Add rest.

name: Scottish Highland Liqueur
ingredients: Angelica root|2 tsp dried and chopped
prepareSteps: Combine all ingreds in aging container. Cover tightly and shake gently several times during the first 24 hrs. After 24 hrs, remove the lemon zest. Cover again and let stand in a cool, dark place for 2 weeks, shaking gently every other day. Strain through a wire sieve to remove the angelica root and fennel. Return to aging container, cover and let stand undisturbed in a cool dark place for 6 months. Siphon or pour clear liqueur into a sterile bottle. The cloudy dregs may be saved for cooking.

name: Tia-Maria
prepareSteps: Boil water, sugar and coffe for 10 mins and let cool. Add rum and vanilla. Put in clean bottle(s) and leave for 1 week before using.

name: Aloha Fruit punch
prepareSteps: Add 1/4 cup water to ginger root. Boil 3 minutes. Strain. Add the liquid to the guava, lemon and pineapple juices. Make a syrup of sugar and remaining water. Cool. Combine with juices and pineapple. Chill throroughly.

name: Apple Cider Punch #1
prepareSteps: If you use the whole all spice and cloves, tie them in cheesecloth. Heat the mixture. Stir occasionally. If you want an alcoholic drink, rum would be nice.

name: Artillery Punch
prepareSteps: Combine all the ingredients in a large punch bowl with a block of ice. If found too dry, sugar syrup may be added. Decorate with twists of lemon peel.

name: Berry Deadly
prepareSteps: Add all ingredients to large bowl. Stir gently. Serve chilled.

name: Cranberry Punch
prepareSteps: Combine first four ingredients. Stir until sugar is dissolved, chill. Then add ginger ale just before serving. Add ice ring to keep punch cold.

name: Egg Nog #4
prepareSteps: In a small mixer bowl beat egg yolks till blended. Gradually add 1/4 cup sugar, beating at high speed till thick and lemon colored. Stir in milk, stir in rum, bourbon, vanilla, and salt. Chill thoroughly. Whip cream. Wash beaters well. In a large mixer bowl beat egg whites till soft peaks form. Gradually add remaining 1/4 cup sugar, beating to stiff peaks. Fold yolk mixture and whipped cream into egg whites. Serve immediately. Sprinkle nutmeg over each serving. Serve in a punch bowl or another big bowl. NOTE: For a nonalcoholic eggnog, prepare Eggnog as above, except omit the bourbon and rum and increase the milk to 3 cups.

name: Egg-Nog - Classic Cooked
prepareSteps: In large saucepan, beat together eggs, sugar and salt, if desired. Stir in 2 cups of the milk. Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is thick enough to coat a metal spoon and reaches 160 degrees F. Remove from heat. Stir in remaining 2 cups milk and vanilla. Cover and regfigerate until thoroughly chilled, several hours or overnight. Just before serving, pour into bowl or pitcher. Garnish or add stir-ins, if desired. Choose 1 or several of: Chocolate curls, cinnamon sticks, extracts of flavorings, flavored brandy or liqueur, fruit juice or nectar, ground nutmeg, maraschino cherries, orange slices, peppermint sticks or candy canes, plain brandy, run or whiskey, sherbet or ice-cream, whipping cream, whipped. Serve immediately.

name: Egg Nog - Healthy
prepareSteps: Whip egg substitute and sugar together, combine with the two kinds of milk, vanilla, and rum. Mix well. Chill over night. Sprinkle with nutmeg. Makes 6 servings.

name: Gluehwein
prepareSteps: Boil sugar and spices in water, leave in the water for 30 minutes. Strain the spiced water and mix with the wine. Heat slowly until short of boiling temperature. (To remove alcohol, let it boil for a while.) You may add lemon or orange juice to taste. Serve in irish coffee cup.

name: Holloween Punch
prepareSteps: Take a bunch of grape juice and a bunch of fizzy stuff (club soda, ginger ale, lemonlime, whatever). Mix them in a punch bowl. Take orange sherbet and lime sherbet. Scoop out scoops and float them in the punch, let them melt a little so that a nasty film spreads all over the top of the punch but there are still "bubbles" in it in the form of sherbet scoops. Looks horrible, tastes just fine.

name: Mulled Wine
prepareSteps: Simmer 3 cups water with, sugar, cloves, cinnamon sticks, and lemon peel in a stainless steel pot for 10 minutes. Add wine heat to a "coffee temperature" (DO NOT BOIL) then add the brandy.

name: Sangria #1
prepareSteps: Mix all together in a pitcher and refrigerate. Add cloves and cinnamon sticks to taste. Serve in wine glasses.

name: Sweet Sangria
prepareSteps: Dissolve the sugar in hot water and cool. Peel the citrus fruits and break into wedges. Mix the wine, sugar syrup, fruit, and Fresca in a pitcher and put in the fridge for a few hours. Serve in tall glasses with a straw.

name: Sangria - The World's Best
prepareSteps: Mix wine, sugar and fruit, and let sit in the fridge for 18-24 hours. The mixture will have a somewhat syrupy consistency. Before serving stir in brandy and cut the mixture with soda water until it have a thinner, more wine like consistency. Serve from a pitcher in wine glasses.

name: Spiced Peach Punch
prepareSteps: Combine peach nectar, orange juice and brown sugar in a large saucepan. Tie cinnamon and cloves in a small cheesecloth bag. Drop into saucepan. Heat slowly, stirring constantly, until sugar dissolves. Simmer 10 minutes. Stir in lime juice. Serve in hot mugs.

name: Strawberry Lemonade
prepareSteps: Throw everything into a blender and mix until fairly smooth. Serve over ice.

name: Sunny Holiday Punch
prepareSteps: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl.

name: Wine Cooler
prepareSteps: Mix wine and soft drink. Pour into glass. Add ice.

name: Wine Punch
prepareSteps: Combine all of the ingredients and pour over a block of ice.

name: Bruce's Puce
prepareSteps: In a regular-sized shot glass, layer, with a spoon or cherry, the grenadine , the Kahlua , then the Bailey's Irish cream in equal portions. It goes down really smooth ,and you don't even need a chaser. It tastes just like chocolate milk.(Really!)

name: Brave Bull Shooter
prepareSteps: Pour Tabasco into bottom of shot glass and fill with tequila.

name: Fahrenheit 5000
prepareSteps: Cover bottom of shot glass with Tabasco Sauce and then fill with half Firewater and half Absolut Peppar.

name: Popped cherry
prepareSteps: Served over ice in a tall glass with a popped cherry (can add more popped cherries if in the mood)!

name: Atomic Lokade
prepareSteps: In a shaker, place lemonade, vodka, blue Curacao, and triple sec together. Shake with ice and strain into glass. Add sugar to taste

name: Diesel
prepareSteps: Pour the lager first then add the blackcurrant cordial. Top up with the cider. The colour sholud be very dark approaching the colour of Guiness.

name: Afternoon
prepareSteps: Build into a suiting glass, with no ice. Cream on top if wanted. Served directly.

name: Kool-Aid Shot
prepareSteps: Pour into a large glass with ice and stir. Add a little cranberry juice to taste.

name: National Aquarium
prepareSteps: Pour all ingredients into a shaker of ice. Shake well. Serve on the rocks.

name: Damned if you do
prepareSteps: Pour into shot glass. Put in mouth. Repeat as deemed necessary.

name: Long vodka
prepareSteps: Shake a tall glass with ice cubes and Angostura, coating the inside of the glass. Por the vodka onto this, add 1 slice of lime and squeeze juice out of remainder, mix with tonic, stir and voila you have a Long Vodka

name: Quick F**K
prepareSteps: In a shot glass add 1/3 Kahlua first. Then 1/3 Miduri, topping it off with a 1/3 bailey's irish cream

name: Owen's Grandmother's Revenge
prepareSteps: Add ingredients and mix in blender.

name: Flaming Dr. Pepper
prepareSteps: Add Amaretto, Bacardi, and vodka. Mix in the Dr. Pepper and beer

name: New York Lemonade
prepareSteps: Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Lemon and sugar the rim. Stir and Strain.

name: Caipirissima
prepareSteps: Same as Caipirinha but instead of cachaca you add WHITE RUM. It's great!!!!!!!!

name: Pisco Sour
prepareSteps: Vigorously shake and strain contents in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes, then pour into glass and garnish with bitters.[1]

name: Big Red
prepareSteps: Pour ingredients into 1 ounce shot glass

name: Black & Tan
prepareSteps: Fill pint glass half full with Bass. Next pour Guiness over a spoon slowly until glass is full. If done correctly the Guiness will stay on top and the Bass on bottom hence the name Black & Tan.

name: Chocolate Milk
prepareSteps: Put the milk in the bottom, pour the Liquer on top and add the dash of amaretto. Do not mix. SLAM IT!

name: B-53
prepareSteps: Layer the Kahlua, Sambucca and Grand Marnier into a shot glas in that order. Better than B-52

name: Sea breeze
prepareSteps: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Snake Bite (UK)
prepareSteps: Pour ingredients into a pint glass. Drink. Fall over.

name: Bob Marley
prepareSteps: Layer in a 2 oz shot glass or pony glass

name: Brainteaser
prepareSteps: layered erin first, then sambuca and then avocart(should sit in middle of other two. To drink: use a straw to suck up avocart then shot the rest and then suck fumes up through straw.

name: Atlantic Sun
prepareSteps: Shake all the ingredients, top the drink with soda. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Green Goblin
prepareSteps: Cider First, Lager then Curacao

name: Oreo Mudslide
prepareSteps: Blend Vodka, Kahlua, Bailey's, ice-cream and the Oreo well in a blender. Pour into a large frosted glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a cherry.

name: ABC
prepareSteps: Layered in a shot glass.

name: Pink Panty Pulldowns
prepareSteps: Shake well

name: Ice Pick #1
prepareSteps: Put Vodka in glass fill with iced tea. Stir in lemon to taste.

name: Tequila Sunrise
prepareSteps: Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice. Add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom. Stir gently to create the sunrise effect. Garnish and serve.

name: Screaming Orgasm
prepareSteps: Pour first vodka, then Bailey's, then Kahlua into a cocktail glass over crushed ice. Stir. Caution: use only high quality vodka. Cheap vodka can cause the Bailey's to curdle. Test your brand of vodka by mixing 1 Tsp each of vodka and Bailey's first.

name: Flander's Flake-Out
prepareSteps: Bang 'em both in.

name: Apple Slammer
prepareSteps: pour into a shot glass and present to consumer, they are expected to cover the top of the shotglass with thier palm, raise the glass, slam it on the bar and the swallow quickly.

name: Amaretto Sour
prepareSteps: Shake and strain. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

name: Cuba Libra
prepareSteps: Fill tall glass with ice cubes. Add rum. Rub cut edge of lime on rim of glass then squeeze juice into glass. Fill with Coca-Cola. Garnish with lime slice. Enjoy!

name: Jelly Bean
prepareSteps: mix equal parts in pony glass-tastes just like a jelly bean!

name: After Five
prepareSteps: 1. Pour Kahlua into shot glass to about 1/2 full. 2. Using a spoon(inverted), slowly pour in the Peppermint Schnapps until glass is about 3/4 full. Done correctly, the Schnapps will flow under the Kahlua for a clear layer. 3. Again using a spoon, but this time right side up, slowly top off the glass with a layer of Bailey's. Be careful to place the spoon right at the top of the Kahlua layer and to raise it as the glass fills up. Done correctly, this will provide a layer of Bailey's floating over the Kahlua. 4. Toss it down all at once for something like a Peppermint Pattie, WITH A BANG!!! NOTE: Best if all ingredients are chilled

name: Midnight Manx
prepareSteps: Fill a mixer with ice and add Baileys, Kahlua, Goldshlager, and cream. Shake for 5 seconds and Strain into a double rocks glass filled with ice. Add chilled coffee Stir and enjoy!

name: Kir Royale
prepareSteps: Pour Creme de cassis in glass, gently pour champagne on top

name: Jackhammer
prepareSteps: Serve over ice- Warning,Deadly!

name: Nutty Irishman
prepareSteps: Serve over ice

name: 3 Wise Men
prepareSteps: put them them in a glass... and slam it to tha head.

name: Miami Vice
prepareSteps: First: Mix pina colada with 2.5 oz. of rum with ice(set aside). Second: Mix daiquiri with 2.5 oz. of rum with ice. Third: While frozen, add pina colda mix then daiquiri mix in glass (Making sure they do not get mixed together).

name: AT&T
prepareSteps: Pour Vodka and Gin over ice, add Tonic and Stir

name: 69 Special
prepareSteps: Pour 2 oz. gin. Add 4 oz. 7-up. Add Lemon Juice for flavor. If you are weak, top up glass with more 7-Up.

name: Irish Coffee
prepareSteps: Heat the coffee, whiskey and sugar; do not boil. Pour into glass and top with cream; serve hot.

name: '57 Chevy with a White License Plate
prepareSteps: 1. Fill a rocks glass with ice 2.add white creme de cacao and vodka 3.stir

name: Mother's Milk
prepareSteps: Shake over ice, strain. Serves two.

name: Zippy's Revenge
prepareSteps: Mix Kool-Aid to taste then add Rum and ammaretto. shake well to disolve the sugar in the Kool-Aid... serve cold

name: Belgian Blue
prepareSteps: Just pour all ingredients in the glass and stir...

name: Red Snapper
prepareSteps: One shot each, shake n shoot

name: Jamaica Kiss
prepareSteps: Fill a tumbler with ice cubes. Add a shot of Tia Maria and a shot of Jamaican light rum. Fill the tumbler with milk. Blend until smooth and serve immediately.

name: Absolut Summertime
prepareSteps: Add all ingredients except lemon to shaker filled with ice. Cover and shake vigorously. Strain contents into ice filled collins glass. Garnish with lemon.

name: Cosmopolitan Martini
prepareSteps: Pour all ingredients in mixing glass half filled with ice, shake and strain into chilled Martini glass.

name: Ziemes Martini Apfelsaft
prepareSteps: Serve without ice. At least the juice shold have room temperature.

name: Vodka Martini
prepareSteps: Shake the vodka and vermouth together with a number of ice cubes, strain into a cocktail glass, add the olive and serve.

name: Cafe Savoy
prepareSteps: Fill mug almost to top with coffee.Add milk, triple sec and brandy. Stir.

name: Snowball
prepareSteps: Place one ice cube in the glass and add 1 1/2 oz of Advocaat. Fill up the glass with lemonade and decorate with a slice of lemon. Serve at once.

name: Mocha-Berry
prepareSteps: pour 6 oz. of coffee in a mug or Irish coffee cup. add coca mix and chambord, mix well and top off with whipped cream.
pour kaluha, then Baileys, then Frangelico not chilled and not layered -- SERVE!!!

name: Addison Special
prepareSteps: Combine ingredients in the order listed into a shaker. Fill half full with ice and shake well. Strain into glass with ice and garnish with a cherry and orange wedge.

name: California Root Beer
prepareSteps: Put Kahlua and Galliano in highball glass fill with soda

name: Amaretto Stone Sour
prepareSteps: Shake and Serve over ice

name: Blind Russian
prepareSteps: Fill glass with ice. Add all liquers. Add milk. shake.

name: Absolut Sex
prepareSteps: Shake Absolut Kurant, Midori, and Cranberry juice in shaker with ice: Strain into rocks glass: Splash of seven on top.Absolut Sex.

name: Aztec Punch
prepareSteps: Mix all ingredients in a pitcher. Mix thoroughly and pour into whatever is available, the bigger the better! This drink packs a big punch, so don't over do it.

name: Lemon Drop
prepareSteps: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar.

name: Absolut limousine
prepareSteps: Fill Absolut into a glass. Add Lime juice. Add Ice and lime wedges.

name: Absolut Evergreen
prepareSteps: Mix, pour over ice and top up with Bitter Lemon.

name: Lunch Box
prepareSteps: Fill a pint glass almost full with beer. Then fill the rest with orange juice (careful not to fill it to the top). Then take the shot of Amaretto and drop it in.

name: Kool-Aid Slammer
prepareSteps: Fill half the shot glass with the kool-aid first. Then put a paper towel over the top of the glass and slowly pour in the vodka. If you do it right, you should be able to see that the two liquids are separated, with the vodka on top. Now slam it! The last thing you'll taste is the kool-aid.

name: Kurant Tea
prepareSteps: Pour Absolut Kurant into a comfortably big tea-cup. Add the not too hot(!) apple tea and, if you like, some sugar. Enjoy!

name: Dirty Nipple
prepareSteps: This is a layered shot - the Bailey's must be on top

name: Darkwood Sling
prepareSteps: There are many good cherry liqueurs you can use, but I prefere Heering. Add one share of the liqueur. Then you add one share of Soda. For a sour sling use Tonic (most people prefer the drink without Tonic). Afterwards you fill the glass with Orange Juice and ice cubes.

name: Bailey's Dream Shake
prepareSteps: Blend ingredients for 30 seconds. Definitely refreshing for a hot summer's day !

name: Bumble Bee #1
prepareSteps: This is a layered shot. First pour the Bailey's into the shot glass. Then take an upside down spoon and touch it to the inside wall of the glass. Carefully add the Kahlua. Repeat this process for the Sambuca. If done properly, the alcohol will stay separated and resemble a bumble bee. Enjoy!!!

name: A.D.M. (After Dinner Mint)
prepareSteps: shake vigorously

name: A Splash of Nash
prepareSteps: Drop shot glass with banana & melon liquers into a 9 oz hi- ball glass containing soda water and cranberry juice. Drink in one shot.

name: Amaretto Sunrise
prepareSteps: Mix together the amaretto and orange juice. Pour into glass and then add the grenadine untill you see the sunrise.

name: Arizona Stingers
prepareSteps: Place ice cubes in the hurricane glass . Add the 2 HEAPING shots of Absolute Vodka (Note: You can add as many shots of Absolute as you want!) Fill the rest of glass with the Arizona Icetea with lemon. Stir to mix using a spoon. Drink up and enjoy!!!!!!!

name: Orange Push-up
prepareSteps: Combine liquors in a blender. Add a half scoop of ice and blend. Garnish with an orange and cherry flag. So good it will melt in your mouth!!!

name: 151 Florida Bushwacker
prepareSteps: Combine all ingredients. Blend until smooth. Garnish with chocolate shavings if desired.

name: Zizi Coin-coin
prepareSteps: Pour 5cl of Cointreau on ice, add 2cl of fresh lemon (or lime) juice, stir gently, and finally add slices of lemon/lime in glass.
fill glass with crushed ice. Add vodka. Add a splash of grand-marnier. Fill with o.j.

name: Tequila Surprise
prepareSteps: Fill shot glass with Tequila. Add drops of Tobasco sauce.

name: Cream Soda
prepareSteps: Pour 1oz of Spiced Rum into a highball glass with ice. Fill with Ginger Ale.

name: ACID
prepareSteps: Poor in the 151 first followed by the 101 served with a Coke or Dr Pepper chaser.

name: Arctic Fish
prepareSteps: Fill glass with ice and fish, add vodka, grape soda and orange juice. DO NOT STIR!!!!! Serve well chilled.

name: Grim Reaper
prepareSteps: Mix Kahlua and 151 in glass. Quickly add ice and pour grenadine over ice to give ice red tint.

name: Freddy Kruger
prepareSteps: make it an ample size shot!!

name: Bubble Gum
prepareSteps: Layer in order into a shot glass.

name: Kiwi Lemon
prepareSteps: Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with slice of kiwi.

name: Hot Creamy Bush
prepareSteps: Combine all ingredients in glass

name: Midnight Mint
prepareSteps: If available, rim cocktail (Martini) glass with sugar syrup then dip into chocolate flakes or powder. Add ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake well then strain into cocktail glass.

name: Talos Coffee
prepareSteps: Add your GM and then add your coffee.

name: Zinger
prepareSteps: Get a shot glass and pour in three shots of the schnapps. Do the same with the Surge Cola. Then down it like Scheetz would.

name: Jello shots
prepareSteps: Boil 3 cups of water then add jello. Mix jello and water until jello is completely disolved. Add the two cups of vodka and mix together. Pour mixture into plastic shot glasses and chill until firm. Then, eat away...

name: Rum Punch

name: Turkeyball
prepareSteps: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

name: Absolutely Cranberry Smash

name: Kiss me Quick
prepareSteps: mix in the glass

name: Royal Flush

name: Limona Corona
prepareSteps: Open the Corona. Fill the empty space in the neck in the bottle with the rum. The bottle should be filled to the top. Plug the bottle with your thumb or the palm of your hand. Turn the bottle upside-down so the rum and beer mix. Turn the bottle rightside-up, unplug, and drink.

name: Pysch Vitamin Light
prepareSteps: Shake with ice.

name: Apello
prepareSteps: Stirr. Grnish with maraschino cherry.

name: Texas Rattlesnake
prepareSteps: Mix all ingredients and Shake well. Sweet at first, with a BITE at the end...

name: After sex
prepareSteps: Pour the vodka and creme over some ice cubes in a tall glass and fill up with juice. to make it beuty full make the top of the glass with a grenadine and sugar

name: San Francisco

name: Amaretto Shake
prepareSteps: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend at high speed until smooth. Serve in chilled glass garnished with bittersweet chocolate shavings.

name: A Day at the Beach
prepareSteps: Shake Rum, Amaretto, and Orange Juice in a shaker filled with ice. Strain over ice into a highball glass. Add Grenadine and garnish with a Pineapple Wedge and a Strawberry.

name: Malibu Twister

name: Space Odyssey
prepareSteps: Fill glass with ice and add shots of Bacardi and Malibu. Add splash of pineapple juice and top with orange juice. Add grenadine for color and garnish with cherries.

name: Zenmeister
prepareSteps: Mix together and enjoy

name: Avalon
prepareSteps: Fill a tall glass with ice. Layer the Finlandia Vodka, lemon and apple juices, Pisang Ambon, and top up with lemonade. Stir slightly and garnish with a spiralled cucumber skin and a red cherry. The cucumber provides zest and looks attractive. This drink, created by Timo Haimi, took first prize in the 1991 Finlandia Vodka Long Drink Competition.
Add both ingredients to shot glass, shoot, and get drunk quick

name: 3-Mile Long Island Iced Tea
prepareSteps: Fill 14oz glass with ice and alcohol. Fill 2/3 glass with cola and remainder with sweet & sour. Top with dash of bitters and lemon wedge.

name: Zorro
prepareSteps: add all and pour black coffee and add whipped cream on top.

name: Orange Crush
prepareSteps: Add all ingredients to tumbler-Pour as shot

name: 155 Belmont
prepareSteps: Blend with ice. Serve in a wine glass. Garnish with carrot.

name: 1-900-FUK-MEUP
prepareSteps: Shake ingredients in a mixing tin filled with ice cubes. Strain into a rocks glass.

name: Vodka Russian
prepareSteps: Mix it as a ordinary drink .

name: Danbooka
prepareSteps: pour it in and mix it.

name: 110 in the shade
prepareSteps: Drop shooter in glass. Fill with beer

name: Grand Blue
prepareSteps: Serve in an old fashioned glass.

name: Baby Eskimo

name: Tennesee Mud

name: Swedish Coffee

name: Adam Sunrise
prepareSteps: Fill blender up with ice. Fill half with Bartons Vodka. Put 10 tsp of sugar, add 1/2 can lemonade concentrate, fill to top with water. Blend for 60 seconds.

name: Absolut Stress #2
prepareSteps: Mix well. Garnish with Orange and Cherry. Enjoy

name: Chocolate Monkey
prepareSteps: blend liqeuors with ice-cream, milk and syrup. pour into parfait glass, top with whipped cream and garnish with banana and cherry.

name: Texas Sling
prepareSteps: Blend with Ice until smooth. Serve in a tulip glass, top with whip cream.

name: A midsummernight dream

name: Zoksel

name: Fuzzy Asshole

name: B-52

name: Mudslinger

name: Campari Beer
prepareSteps: Use a 15 oz glass. Add Campari first. Fill with beer.

name: Almond Chocolate Coffee
prepareSteps: Pour in order into coffee cup. Top with whipped creme and chocolate shcvings.

name: Amaretto Stone Sour #3
prepareSteps: Shake sour mix, tequila and amaretto with ice. Strain into highball glass. Add a splash of OJ. Garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

name: 9 1/2 Weeks

name: Absolutly Screwed Up
prepareSteps: Shake it up it tasts better that way, but you can stir it if you want. 6 of those and you will be wasted for the rest of the night.

name: Whitecap Margarita
prepareSteps: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. This makes one drink.

name: Bellini Martini
prepareSteps:
Add ice cubes to shaker.
Add vodka.
Add peach schnapps.
Add peach nectar.
Shake.
Strain into glass.
Add lemon twist peel.

name: Jitterbug
prepareSteps: Wet glass, dip rim in sugar. Then add Ice. Then add everything else. It's that simple!

name: Moranguito
prepareSteps: first you put rhe absinthe, then put tequila, then put the Granadine syrup.

name: Amaretto Sweet & Sour

name: Rum Runner
prepareSteps: Mix all ingredients in glass & add ice.

name: H.D.
prepareSteps: Mix the whisky and Baileys Cream in a beer-glass (at least 50 cl). Fill the rest of the glass with coffee.

name: The Evil Blue Thing
prepareSteps: Pour ingredients into glass, and drop in a blue whale! The blue whale isn't really necessary, but it makes the drink more "fun".

name: Shark Attack
prepareSteps: Mix lemonade and water according to instructions on back of can. If the instructions say to add 4 1/3 cans of water do so. Mix into pitcher. Add 1 1/2 cup of Vodka (Absolut). Mix well. Pour into glass of crushed ice. Excellent!

prepareSteps: After pouring in your ingredients, and adding 3-5 ice cubes, according to taste. Stir the drink with a stirrer to get the Vanilla off the bottom.

name: Apple Grande

name: Bleeding Surgeon
prepareSteps: Pour Shot of Rum over slice of orange. Fill the remaining space in glass half way full of surge or similar drink. Finish off glass with cranberry juice. Be carefull, warm surge may foam over the glass.

name: Applejack

name: Adam Bomb

name: Arizona Antifreeze
prepareSteps: Pour all ingredients into shot glass and slam !!!!

name: Black and Brown
prepareSteps: CAREFULLY to avoid explosive head formation: Pour Beer glass half full of favorite rootbeer and top off with Guinness.

name: A Piece of Ass

name: Avalanche

name: Brandon and Will's Coke Float

name: Flaming Lamborghini

Set light the concotion in the cocktail glass and start to drink through the straw (this drink should be drunk in one) , as the bottom of the glass is reached put out the fire by pouring the Baileys and Blue Curacao into the cocktail glass and keep drinking till it's all gone!!

name: Zipperhead
prepareSteps: Fill glass with rocks, add straw before putting in liquor. Then add the ingredients in order, trying to keep layered as much as possible (i.e. Chambord on bottom, then Vodka, Then soda on top).

name: A Gilligan's Island

name: Kioki Coffee
prepareSteps: Stir. Add whipped cream to the top.

name: Apple Pie with A Crust
prepareSteps: Just mix the two liquids and sprinkle in the cinnamon. Serve either cold or heated.

name: Zorbatini
prepareSteps: Prepare like a Martini. Garnish with a green olive.

name: Vodka Fizz

name: Radioactive Long Island Iced Tea

name: Shot-gun
prepareSteps: Pour one part Jack Daneils and one part Jim Beam into shot glass then float Wild Turkey on top.

name: Bible Belt
prepareSteps: Mix all ingredients, and pour over ice.

name: Irish Curdling Cow

name: Sweet Tooth
prepareSteps: Put 2 shots Godiva Liquour into a glass, add as much or as little milk as you would like.

name: Downshift
prepareSteps: Start with the Sprite. Next comes the tequila. After that, add the Minute Maid Fruit Punch, then float the 151. Rocks optional.

name: Pink Penocha
prepareSteps: mix all ingredients into bowl keep iced stir frequently

name: Orange Whip
prepareSteps: Pour ingredients over ice and stir.

name: Bruised Heart

name: Auburn Headbanger

name: Homemade Kahlua

name: 24k nightmare

name: Caribbean Boilermaker

name: Army special

name: 501 Blue

name: Arctic Mouthwash

name: Brain Fart

name: Royal Bitch

name: Citrus Coke

name: Smut

name: Raspberry Cooler

name: Amaretto Sunset

name: Cherry Electric Lemonade
prepareSteps: Now stir vigorously and then pour over a large cup of ice. Now drink it with a straw and stir occasionally.

name: Girl From Ipanema

Close the shaker and shake vigorously. Pour the liquid into a glass, top up with ginger ale, stir with a teaspoon and then garnish the rim of the glass with a slice of lime

name: Dark Caipirinha
prepareSteps:
Muddle the sugar into the lime wedges in an old-fashioned glass.
Fill the glass with ice cubes.
Pour the cachaca into the glass.
Stir well.

Pour the vodka, dry vermouth and olive brine into a cocktail shaker with a handful of ice and shake well.
Rub the rim of a martini glass with the wedge of lemon.
Strain the contents of the cocktail shaker into the glass and add the olive.
A dirty Martini contains a splash of olive brine or olive juice and is typically garnished with an olive.

name: Duchamp's Punch

Shake all ingredients.
Double strain in a chilled double old fashioned glass with abig ice cube.
Garnish with a couple of lavender sprigs

name: Bacardi Cocktail
prepareSteps: Shake together with ice. Strain into glass and serve.

name: Between The Sheets

name: Casino

name: Clover Club

name: Derby

name: Mary Pickford
prepareSteps: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass

name: Monkey Gland
prepareSteps: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Paradise
prepareSteps: Shake together over ice. Strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled.

name: Planter's Punch

name: White Lady

name: Bellini

name: French Connection

name: Golden dream
prepareSteps: Shake with cracked ice. Strain into glass and serve.

name: Grasshopper
prepareSteps: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake briskly and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Hemingway Special

name: Horse's Neck

name: Kir

name: Long Island Iced Tea

name: Mimosa

name: Mint Julep

name: Pina Colada

name: Rose

name: Barracuda

name: Espresso Martini

name: French Martini

name: Russian Spring Punch

name: Spritz

name: Tommy's Margarita

name: Vampiro
prepareSteps: Vampiros may be made in a tall glass or an old fashioned glass. Bartenders may first "rim" the glass with Kosher Salt, which is done by placing a layer of Kosher Salt on a chopping board, moistening the glass' rim with lime juice or water, and then placing the upside down glass rim onto the Kosher Salt, so that the salt sticks to the moistened rim. The second step is to fill half the glass with ice and add one or two shooter glasses full of high quality Tequila. The next stage is to add the flavouring elements. This is done by squeezing a fresh lime into the glass, adding a few grains of salt, adding citrus-flavoured soda pop, until the glass is 4/5 full, and then adding spicy Viuda de Sanchez (or orange juice, lime juice and pico de gallo). The final step is to stir the ingredients so that the flavours are properly blended.

name: Vesper

name: Yellow Bird

name: Butter Baby

name: Boozy Snickers Milkshake
prepareSteps: Place the snickers bars in a plastic bag and roll over them with a rolling pin until crushed. Add crushed snickers pieces, ice cream, milk, caramel sauce, chocolate sauce, and chocolate liquor to a blender. Blend until shake is thick and frothy. Pour into glasses and top with chocolate liquor and whip cream.

name: A1
prepareSteps: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, mix and serve over ice into a chilled glass.

name: Abbey Martini
prepareSteps: Put all ingredients into a shaker and mix, then strain contents into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Absolutely Fabulous

name: Ace

name: Adam & Eve

name: Addington
